module.name: PDF Converter
module.description: This is a module that can be used to convert content files from content navigation to pdf format files
module.name: Convertisseur PDF
module.description: Ce module peut être utilisé pour convertir des contenus de fichier de navigation vers un format pdf

release.notes: Convert course content to a pdf document. This module creates a side menu block with a link that when clicked generates the page being viewd as a PDF file. This is an extra module
